artist: Artist: Jody Williams; Publisher: Flying Paper Press, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer
description: Small book with orange covers with black lines and dots; attached accordion-folded blue pages with text and small rectangular abstract images; book fits into purple slipcover with orange zigzags and dots
dimension: 2 3/4 x 2 3/16 x 1 1/16 in. (6.99 x 5.56 x 2.7 cm) (overall, closed)
provenance: Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer, Orono, Minn.; given to MIA, 2004.
title: Loitering Wildlife
